snippet: In 2012, United States exports of goods rose 4.5 percent from 2011, a faster rate of growth than that of 10 other major countries but well below the growth rate of Chinese exports.
lead_paragraph: In 2012, United States exports of goods rose 4.5 percent from 2011, a faster rate of growth than that of 10 other major countries but well below the growth rate of Chinese exports.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: U.S. Trade in 2012 Outpaced Many Other Countries
headline.main: Off the Charts: U.S. Trade in 2012 Outpaced Many Other Countries
